name: "The Teeniest Varo" - pixel art of Remedios Varo's "The Creation Of Birds" - by Lorem Ipsum
description: This is a 4096 x 4096 animated pixelart rendition of Remedios Varo's 1957 painting "The Creation Of Birds". In its base 20 x 20 ratio, it is the most accurate teeny replica of a Varo work known.
